summary:
Title: Co-Branding Agreement between 2TheMart Com Inc and i-Escrow Inc

This Co-Branding Agreement, effective from August 26, 1999, outlines the terms between 2TheMart Com Inc and i-Escrow Inc for a one-year period, renewable, regarding their co-branded services. Key obligations include 2TheMart providing materials and services "as is," disclaiming all warranties, and i-Escrow acting in good faith and indemnifying 2TheMart against any claims arising from its acts or misrepresentations. Termination can occur for various reasons, with surviving provisions ensuring completion of pending customer transactions. Notable risks include potential liabilities for breaches and penalties for non-compliance with the agreement's terms.

termination_clause.raw_clause: Upon expiration or termination of this Agreement for any reason: (a) all rights granted herein shall terminate, (b) i-Escrow shall pay all amounts owed to 2TheMart within six (6) weeks of termination, and (c) each party shall remove the other party's content and Marks from their servers. Notwithstanding the foregoing, unless this Agreement was terminated for a material breach, all provisions of this Agreement shall survive to the extent necessary for i-Escrow to complete any Customer transactions which are pending at the time.
termination_clause.normalized_clause: Termination: Upon any reason, all rights granted under the Agreement terminate, i-Escrow pays all owed amounts to 2TheMart within six weeks, and both parties remove each other's content and marks from their servers. Unless terminated for material breach, all provisions of the Agreement survive to complete pending Customer transactions.

summary: This Development Agreement between Aimmune Therapeutics Inc. and Xencor outlines the terms for the development, manufacturing, and commercialization of certain therapeutic products. Key obligations include Aimmune granting Xencor exclusive rights to develop and manufacture the products, while Xencor agrees to provide Aimmune with development and manufacturing services. Aimmune has the right to terminate the agreement with a 60-day written notice. Both parties must keep confidential all disclosed confidential information and use it only for the purpose of performing under the agreement. Neither party will be liable for lost profits or indirect damages, but Xencor agrees to indemnify Aimmune for any losses arising from breaches of the agreement. Failure to comply with obligations or confidentiality breaches may result in penalties.

summary: Development Agreement between Client and Developer for the design of an Application. The Developer agrees to create the Application System as per Client's specifications, devote necessary time, and perform Services in a workmanlike manner. The Client is responsible for payment as outlined in Exhibit A. Key obligations include the Developer's control over the means and method of Service delivery, and the Developer's representation of having the right to perform the Services and the ability to do so lawfully. Notable risks/penalties include termination for breach, Developer's liability for taxes, and penalties if found not to be an independent contractor. Confidentiality obligations apply to both parties, and the Developer must deliver all assets used during the project upon completion. Amendments require written consent from both parties, and the Client may assign the Agreement freely, while the Developer may only transfer payment rights with Client's written consent.

3. By either Party for a material breach.
